text: Thermodesulfobium narugense is a sulfate-reducing, strictly anaerobic and moderate thermophilic bacterium from the genus of Thermodesulfobium which has been isolated from a hot spring from Miyagi Prefecture in Japan. This microorganism is nonmotile, rod-shaped, Gram-negative and non-spore-forming. ==References== Category:Thermoanaerobacterales Category:Bacteria described in 2004 Category:Thermophiles Category:Anaerobes
title: Thermodesulfobium narugense
